name: Prism Strangers
description: Prism Strangers is a 2D pixel art side-scroller about an 8-year-old girl named Lucy. After mysteriously turning gray, Lucy becomes lost in ‘Prism World’, a universe full of quirky, colorful doppelgangers. Along her journey she befriends a hungry puppy and an odd girl named Pond. Will Lucy ever turn back to normal and find a way home?
